meanings.definition: A carnivorous mammal of the weasel family, native to Africa.

meanings.sent2: I saw a zoril darting between the trees in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The zoril peeked out from behind a rock, looking mischievous.

meanings.definition: The fur of the zoril, used for making clothing.
